about.title: Who am I?
about.description_1: I'm Nathan, an Information Systems student at UFRN. <bold>I've always been into technology, but it was when I started creating solutions that actually help people that I fell in love with coding.</bold> A memorable moment was delivering my first website to a client from Portugal.
about.description_2: Outside of code, I'm a calm and adaptable person. I enjoy sports, working out, and reading. My goal is to become a reference in the field and use technology to make a difference.
